item.description:
Let's try to see some fall colors again. For people who went to Mt Major and want to re-experience getting sore all over (just kidding), or you didn't get to go and want to experience the beautiful scenery and sense of accomplishment.

Hike should not be too strenuous - about 5 hrs total. [45 mins. going up to the summit, then scroll back to the parking lot for the next 3+ hrs.]

Website: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/central/wach.htm.  You can print out a map from the site.  Read the comment section for the trails that we'll follow.

*Carpool passengers - please help out w/ costs of gas/tolls. It will be appreciated by the drivers.

Last minute reminders:
1) Meet at 1 Gregory Road which intersects with Mountain Road in Princeton, MA. NOT 345 Mountain Rd.

2) Plan an extra 15-30 min for your drive as we really need to start on time. We need to get done before sunset at 6 pm.

3) Bring water, jacket (or dress in layers), pack your own lunch & snack.

4) Good hiking/athletic shoes are required.

5) Eat something prior as lunch will be late (whenever we get to the top).

6) No restrooms at our meeting location.  Please find a place to make a bio-stop ahead of time.  The Visitor's Center has restrooms, but allow plenty of time as there will probably be lots of people and parking may be difficult.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Wachusett Foliage Hike
